entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: The Minister of Magic who got the top job.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: A person who was shunted sideways into the Department of International Magical Cooperation.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character thinking about Crouch's past.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: A house-elf found beneath the Dark Mark.

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Harry's friend who is talking to him.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A person who says Crouch is obsessed with catching Dark wizards.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The person whose office was searched by Crouch.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend who is talking to him.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Harry's friend who is being looked at by Ron.

relationships.description: Crouch overreacted to Winky being found beneath the Dark Mark because it brought back memories of his son and the old scandal.
Moody says Crouch is obsessed with catching Dark wizards.
Sirius thinks Crouch is obsessed with catching one more Death Eater to bring back his old popularity.
Ron says that Crouch sneaked up here to search Snape's office.
